title: Chapter 1391 - Only If You Beg
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1391 - Only If You Beg

When the yellow dog, Xing Que, saw that Daoist Master Red Cloud was ignoring this topic of conversation completely, it considerately said no more on the matter.

Meng Changyun and the Netherworld King, however, were still worried. On several occasions, they started to speak, then trailed off. The atmosphere grew strange and stifled.

When the dog saw this, it couldn’t help but comfort them. “Rest assured and cultivate. It’ll be fine. That guy controls the power of reincarnation. Even if they kill him, he’ll just have to reincarnate again.”

“???” The Netherworld King didn’t know what to make of that. Is that supposed to comfort me?

Meng Changyun thought for a moment, then tried to comfort himself instead. “Seems to me that His Excellency wouldn’t have agreed to this duel unless he was certain he could emerge victorious!”

The dog snapped, “If you knew that, what the hell were you so worried about?

A moment later, it recalled something and blurted, “Last time, my mistress gave him the Nebula Talisman. Surely he doesn’t think that carrying this treasure means he can do whatever he wants without fear?”

“Given Fellow Daoist Su’s disposition, how could he possibly trust his life and death to an external treasure like that?” Daoist Master Red Cloud’s...
